turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to place an order for me at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks location would you like me to place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on University St. in Springfield please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Caramel Macchiato please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Any special milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Have them use almond milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make that a tall also.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. You want a tall Caramel Macchiato with almond milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ordering now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I ordered a tall Caramel Macchiato with almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It wll be ready shortly for pickup

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They will send you a receipt via text to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome
